docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS, N.Y., April 13--A statistical survey made public here today shows that it costs slightly more to live in Paris than in New York and a good deal less in Vienna.

docs.abstract: UN statistics bulletin compares living costs in cities around world

headline.main: U.N. Finds Costs in Paris A Bit Higher Than Here

docs.snippet: PUNTA DEL ESTE, Uruguay, April 14--When the American Presidents ended their sessions here and filed out to their limousines past the silver-helmeted dragoon guards, President Otto Arosemena Gomez of Ecuador was not one of those, who stood out.
